text: @RepDougCollins In case anyone's interested. the (incomplete) COVID-19 stats trump quoted in a tweet this AM (546 confirmed cases of COVID-19, w/22 deaths), show a US COVID-19 death rate at 4%. He was trying to say that wow the flu is worse, but no, COVID-19 is worse.  Minimal available testing.
